channel.title: Porchie PK - NEED DEVELOPERS
channel.description:
Welcome to the development team thread for Porchie PK, if you haven't seen any pictures or video's on this project yet, you can view them in the development thread for Porchie PK, which has all the up to date info on the current status of the project. Anyways, I've decided to begin looking for a development team to help me speed up progress on the server, as it's about 50-60% completed right now. This is a dungeon - based server, with token rewards, however it incorporates all this into an older version of RS. The server also has minigames, pk areas, custom teleports and bosses, as well as items, however there are also a few minor things I need some help with, which is why I'm looking for a team.
Source - Delta (Not DeltaScape) Development Thread - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,511608.0.html General Info : Dungeon based with token reward system, as well as many custom minigames. Players will never be bored!
[IMG]http://i238.photobucket.com/albums/ff11/silent19831/media.png[/img]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2llxUij9jY4&feature=related http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FKcipNH-5nQ&feature=related http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JFNtuATodC0
Application Form [code] How old are you : Contact Information (MSN, Yahoo, Skype, etc.) : How much time do you have available to code? : Recent work or projects (Examples) : Experience with coding Position you're applying for : [/code] [b]Current Developers[/b]
Client - Porchie - Blank - Blank
Server - Porchie - Daginith - Blank
Website Developers - Chrisl1924 - Blank
My MSN is rofllife42@hotmail.com, and if you have any questions about joining the development team, or questions about the server feel free to ask on here or message me on msn.
Thanks - Porchie

item.title: Porchie PK - NEED DEVELOPERS
item.dc:creator: @porchie porchie
item.description:
@porchie wrote:

Hot_Potato:

Like Uncalled said, You can’t just say “he looks like a good coder, hes in” you have test them out if you know what I mean.

if a coder on my team doesn’t meet my standards, what’s so hard about kicking them from the team? You guys need to stop posting spam in my topic, I know enough to test my coders etc… If you’re not on the team, why do you care? Btw… who is Uncalled? (PM me so you don’t post for no reason)

Read full topic

item.title: Porchie PK - NEED DEVELOPERS
item.dc:creator: @porchie porchie
item.description:
@porchie wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

I have no need for postcount. I hate 600+… all from trolling and helping! Anyways im done as you now follow the rules for the section.

Tell me then, why do you continue to post here for no reason. No rules are being broken, good day to you bud.

OT : We still need more developers, and we also need a hoster, as my internet provider doesn’t allow servers to be hosted off of it for some reason…

item.title: Porchie PK - NEED DEVELOPERS
item.dc:creator: @porchie porchie
item.description:
@porchie wrote:

Rippin, enough about the name you clearly disregarded my post and were just looking for a post count, btw this is an area for development teams, not criticism on my server name, go to my development thread if you’d like to do that.

As for media, I’ve posted a video on here so you can see around, however the main media is still on the development thread only.

Back on topic though, I’ve sent you a pm Daginith, you’ve been accepted.

Read full topic

item.title: Porchie PK - NEED DEVELOPERS
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:11, topic:413047”][quote author=Native^ link=topic=514520.msg3736278#msg3736278 date=1314992911]

If you just read, and click the link.
[/quote]He still needs to post them in this thread.[/quote]
It’s like 40 pictures.
Gl with this, the game play is original, which is what we need.

item.title: Porchie PK - NEED DEVELOPERS
item.dc:creator: @porchie porchie
item.description:
@porchie wrote:

[quote=“Chrisl1924, post:3, topic:413047”]My gosh. It looks absolutely spectacular. Although Unlocking the higher bosses would be nice as a minigame But anyways-

How old are you : 15
Contact Information (MSN, Yahoo, Skype, etc.) : calemke1924@yahoo.com, Skype= Clemke1924 Also you can pm me on here, I prefer that to anything.
How much time do you have available to code? : I’m actually starting a class for school using javascript, html, css, php, the whole lot, so I can do this as one of my various projects, as well as spend time on the side! My plan is to make some forums and a webpage, and continue to add on to them later on.
Recent work or projects (Examples) : www.beastpkz.tk www.trinitypk.tk (these are not spectacular, I admit. Most of my good ones were built for servers that don’t exist anymore. If you have any questions I can get you more examples)
Experience with coding: Quite a few. 4 or 5 I’d say.
Position you’re applying for : Web developer. I do not need a partner right away, as I like setting things up on my own, but after a while it would be nice.

Great server! I’m excited to see where it will go. Thanks

Note In regards to the trinity website, I am unsure as to why the link on it is not working… Sorry about that.[/quote]

Accepted, I’ve sent you a PM and added you on MSN

Read full topic

Great server! I’m excited to see where it will go. Thanks
